snippet: Concluding a long effort to take gray wolves in the Northern Rockies off the endangered species list, the federal Fish and Wildlife Service lifted protections for most Wyoming wolves.
abstract: Federal Fish and Wildlife Service lifts protections for most Wyoming gray wolves, concluding a long effort to take gray wolves in the Northern Rockies off the endangered species list.
lead_paragraph: Concluding a long effort to take gray wolves in the Northern Rockies off the endangered species list, the federal Fish and Wildlife Service lifted protections for most Wyoming wolves.

headline.main: Wyoming: Federal Protections End For Gray Wolves
headline.print_headline: Wyoming: Federal Protections End For Gray Wolves
